pages.text: An essential item to control any aspect of a turret.$(br2)Right-click a turret with it will show you an UI for turret configuration.$(br2)Note that certain upgrades may add pages, explained in the respective upgrade entry.

pages.title: 1. Tab: Turret Info
pages.text: This tab will show you general information (a POV camera, turret name - editable, health, ammo, current target, owner, shielding - only on the $(l:turrets/forcefield)Forcefield Turret$()).$(br2)At the bottom are control buttons to dismantle and (de-)activate the turret as well as toggle a display showing its range.
$(italic)An example of the info page for a $(l:turrets/crossbow)Crossbow Turret$(/l) inside a forest$(/italic)
